name: CounterActSexualViolence
0:
”Alexa, ask Counteracting Sexual Violence”
”How can I prevent sexual violence?”
”What is a sign of an unhealthy relationship?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: counteracting sexual violence
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sexual violence and harassment are all around us. This skill gives practical tips on what to say and do when you see it, hear it or feel it. Born out of a year-long initiative at Arizona State University, the largest public university in the country, the CounterAct skill boils down a lot of what was discussed and explored over the year into everyday tips and knowledge about the subject for all people. 
https://herbergerinstitute.asu.edu/research-and-initiatives/counteract
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
